posts.post_content:
Prices below, OBO. Shipping is $3.50 for under $250, and $7.50 for over $250 (at $250, flip a coin; heads is $7.50, tails is $3.50 haha - kidding). Feel free to PM or email me at [url]kmayusa6060@gmail.com[/url].

Nap Lajoie (Throwing; SGC 30/2): $OLD
Addie Joss (Hands at Chest; SGC 20/1.5): $OLD
Elmer Flick (SGC 20/1.5): $OLD
Down to a duo after Joss sold.
Lajoie sold. Flick is left. Open to offers.
